name: Santa Fun Games: Kids
description:
Santa and all of his friends are waiting at the North Pole, and they’ve got lots of games to play! Bring your kids to play with the Elves, the Reindeer, Snowmen and even Mr and Mrs Claus!

+++

FEATURES
+ Designed for Toddlers
+ 4 Exciting Games to play
+ 8 Different characters
+ Sky changes colour during day and night
+ Kid-friendly interface
+ No ads
+ No In-app purchases

CATCH SANTA
Quickly try to catch Santa and all of his friends, before they hide behind their snowballs!

BALLOON POP
All of the balloons have been let out and are floating away! They need your help at the North Pole to pop them all before it’s too late!

MATCHING PAIRS
Peer into Mr and Mrs Claus’ house, and see which characters are hiding behind the frost. Match all the pairs together!

BUILD A FACE
All of the characters faces have fallen apart, into little pieces! They need your help to put them back together again!

+++

Santa Fun Games: Kids is made for children as young as 3, yet is still fun for the whole family to enjoy. It’s filled with surprises and exciting things to do - there’s no limits, just fun! Come play!
